manifesto.title: The Zaman Way
manifesto.subtitle: The Path of Productive Faith
paragraphs: We treasure time, its passage and its power, In every fleeting minute, every hour. Our nourishment? The knowledge we procure, Belief, our pillar, steadfast and sure.
From failures, lessons learned, so we advance, In every detail, we give more than a glance. For the devil hides in the smallest piece, We seek excellence, not mere release.
Action defines us, louder than our speech, With great efforts, greater heights we reach. Unapologetic, steadfast in our quest, Through good and hard times, we strive to do our best.
Our vision extends beyond the here and now, Planting seeds for futures that our lives allow. To the roots of faith we anchor our cause, Live with purpose, governed by divine laws.
We prepare for a hereafter, bright and fair, With atomic steps and earnest care. Passionate to uplift, to heal, to mend, Providing solutions, on this we depend.
In uplifting the ummah, our spirits soar, Crafting counterpoints, opening new doors. With purpose, passion, belief, we're intertwined, In this manifesto, our aspirations you'll find.
